headline: Italy, pressed to boost defence spending, lashes at 'stupid' EU rules
summary: European Union budget rulesare stupid and senseless and need to be changed to allowmember states to boost defence spending as recommended byBrussels, Italian Economy Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti...
